zh.title: 中国粉碎“四人帮”，文化大革命结束
莫桑比克和平协议签署，结束内战
俄罗斯总统叶利钦宣布国家进入紧急状态
瑞士太阳神庙教徒集体自杀
北约首次启动第五条款，响应911袭击
“太空船一号”完成首次私人载人航天飞行
匈牙利铝厂发生赤泥泄漏事故
美国职业棒球联盟季后赛开打

en.title: Hua Guofeng succeeds Mao Zedong as Chairman of the CCP.
Black filmmaker Oscar Micheaux honored with a Directors Guild of America award.
Free Software Foundation is founded by Richard Stallman.
Televangelist Jim Bakker indicted on fraud and conspiracy charges.
Mozambique's government and RENAMO rebels sign a peace accord in Rome.
Russian President Yeltsin declares a state of emergency in Moscow.
The European Space Agency's Ariane 5 rocket fails on its maiden flight.
SpaceShipOne wins the Ansari X Prize for private spaceflight.
Hungary toxic sludge spill releases red mud, causing environmental disaster.
